verses.text_plain: Hear, ye children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.
verses.verse_html: 1Hear, ye children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.

verses.text_plain: For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.
verses.verse_html: 2For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.

verses.text_plain: For I was my father’s son, tender and only beloved in the sight of my mother.
verses.verse_html: 3For I was my father’s son, tender and only beloved in the sight of my mother.

verses.text_plain: He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.
verses.verse_html: 4He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.

verses.text_plain: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.
verses.verse_html: 5Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.

verses.text_plain: Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.
verses.verse_html: 6Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.

tokens.text: her not, and she shall preserve

verses.text_plain: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.
verses.verse_html: 7Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.

verses.text_plain: Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to honour, when thou dost embrace her.
verses.verse_html: 8Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to honour, when thou dost embrace her.

tokens.text: thee: she shall bring thee to honour

verses.text_plain: She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee.
verses.verse_html:
9She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee. ▼
▼ a crown…: or, she shall compass thee with a crown of glory

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a crown…: or, she shall compass thee with a crown of glory
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a crown…: or, she shall compass thee with a crown of glory

verses.text_plain: Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of thy life shall be many.
verses.verse_html: 10Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of thy life shall be many.

verses.text_plain: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.
verses.verse_html: 11I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.

verses.text_plain: When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble.
verses.verse_html: 12When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble.

verses.text_plain: Take fast hold of instruction; let her not go: keep her; for she is thy life.
verses.verse_html: 13Take fast hold of instruction; let her not go: keep her; for she is thy life.

verses.text_plain: Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.
verses.verse_html: 14Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.

verses.text_plain: Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away.
verses.verse_html: 15Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away.

verses.text_plain: For they sleep not, except they have done mischief; and their sleep is taken away, unless they cause some to fall.
verses.verse_html: 16For they sleep not, except they have done mischief; and their sleep is taken away, unless they cause some to fall.

tokens.text: not, except they have done mischief

verses.text_plain: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.
verses.verse_html: 17For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.

verses.text_plain: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
verses.verse_html: 18But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.

verses.text_plain: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.
verses.verse_html: 19The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.

verses.text_plain: My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings.
verses.verse_html: 20My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings.

verses.text_plain: Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.
verses.verse_html: 21Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.

verses.text_plain: For they are life unto those that find them, and health to all their flesh.
verses.verse_html:
22For they are life unto those that find them, and health to all their flesh. ▼
▼ health: Heb. medicine

verses.text_plain: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
verses.verse_html:
23Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life. ▼
▼ with…: Heb. above all keeping

footnotes.body_html: ▼ with…: Heb. above all keeping

verses.text_plain: Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.
verses.verse_html:
24Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee. ▼
▼ a froward…: Heb. frowardness of mouth and perverseness of lips

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a froward…: Heb. frowardness of mouth and perverseness of lips
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a froward…: Heb. frowardness of mouth and perverseness of lips

verses.text_plain: Let thine eyes look right on, and let thine eyelids look straight before thee.
verses.verse_html: 25Let thine eyes look right on, and let thine eyelids look straight before thee.

verses.text_plain: Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established.
verses.verse_html:
26Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established. ▼
▼ let…: or, all thy ways shall be ordered aright

footnotes.body_text: ▼ let…: or, all thy ways shall be ordered aright
footnotes.body_html: ▼ let…: or, all thy ways shall be ordered aright

verses.text_plain: Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove thy foot from evil.
verses.verse_html: 27Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove thy foot from evil.
